A wound of compassion

May 23, 2013

It was already 6pm, my wife and one of her small group members, Paula, came across a mother and her child (daughter) inside SM Makati. The mother and her family were recently rendered homeless because of a fire, and were begging for help. If there’s one gift my wife has, it’s detecting sincerity.

Dec 10, 2012

My portfolio site has been getting a lot of visitors lately. Through feedback from some friends, the way they see it, the page has too much unnecessary things; that huge image of me doesn’t do anyone any good, as well as that lengthy ‘About’ section. So I radically fixed it and removed most irrelevant prose and made the site even simpler and straightforward.
